ticket.title: rake db:test:load and friends abort if drop fails
ticket.original-body:
I think this is wrong functionality. IMHO, it should just go merrily along rather than abort.
If people think that this will create problems, maybe we could just clear out the test database if the drop database fails.
for more details, read this: http://lenary.github.com/rails/2010/07/rails-databases/#update
